data.title: Love Love Love
data.body: I absolutely love this extension cord! The 10-foot long cord is perfect for reaching across my room and the flat plug is great for saving space behind furniture. The 6 outlets and 3 USB ports provide plenty of options for me to plug in all of my devices. The surge protection gives me peace of mind that my electronics are safe. I also appreciate the USB-C port for fast charging. This is definitely going to be a college dorm room essential for me. Highly recommend!
